alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 3:05PM CDT until May 05 at 11:04PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, moderate flooding affects pasturelands and oil fields between Sapulpa and the Tulsa County line. Barns and other outbuildings experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:36 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 25.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
